record.dc:title: 149MM32, 15MM32, Montgomery County, Kentucky. Camargo Mounds Site. Central Pit & Intrusions.
record.wpa:project_reservoir: Kentucky Adena and Woodland Mound Sites
record.wpa:narrative: The clay which filled the top of the pit was less hard than the walls of the pit and also seemed different in color. The intrusions into this clean clay were filled with a loose dark material.
